text: Krnješevci () is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Stara Pazova municipality, in the Srem District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Serb ethnic majority and its population numbering 1,025 people (2002 census). ==Name== The name of the settlement in Serbian is in the plural, and therefore it is grammatically correct to refer to it as "Krnješevci are" instead of "Krnješevci is". A hypothetical singular version of the name would be Krnješevac. ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Syrmia
title: Krnješevci
